title: Romantic Mornington Peninsula Coastal Escape Just 90 Minutes from Melbourne
description:
Immerse yourself in the dramatic beauty of Victoria’s Mornington Peninsula with a romantic escape at the stylish Quarters at Flinders Hotel. Located on the southern tip of the Peninsula, this Scandinavian-inspired boutique retreat is set within the historic Flinders Hotel, and will be your lavish launchpad to this spectacular corner of Victoria.

Famed for its beautiful beaches and rolling hills dotted with vineyards, the Mornington Peninsula hides surprises around every corner. Its natural beauty extends inland and will accompany you as you discover wonderful wineries, restaurants serving up fresh local produce, delightful cafés and cool breweries. Experience it for yourself from charming Flinders, one of the Peninsula’s most picturesque seaside resort towns, just a 90-minute drive from Melbourne.
offer_address: Cnr. Cook & Wood Sts, Flinders VIC 3929
